Player History
Released by Chicago (N) on 11/4/1965...
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1973...
Had first career hit on 4/24/1973, off Dean Chance (CAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/2/1973, off Don Loun (TEX)...
Drove in 6 runs against Oakland on 4/22/1976...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 5/28/1977...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Had 25-game hitting streak snapped on 5/21/1983...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1984, hitting .471 with 2 HR, 3 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1984...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1985...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/13/1986 to a 1-year deal worth $7,000,001 per year...
Injured on 7/25/1986 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 3 weeks...
Had 2000th career hit on 8/22/1986, off Joaquin Andujar (CHW)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1986...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/7/1987 to a 1-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
